document.full_text: amid growing energy demand from china and political turmoil, opec members appear to be raising oil production. but experts say there are limits to what opec can do.
document.title: as oil demand rises and unrest continues, opec's power over prices has limits
lines_and_colors: amid growing energy demand from china and political turmoil, opec members appear to be raising oil production. but experts say there are limits to what opec can do.
